appName: Offroad Legends VR: Car Racing Game
displayName: Offroad Legends VR: Car Racing Game
display_name: Offroad Legends VR: Car Racing Game
display_long_description:
Strap in and hit the dirt with Offroad Legends VR: Car Racing Game — a thrilling offroad simulation built for Meta Quest!

Take control of rugged 4x4 vehicles and race through challenging environments like rocky mountains, muddy trails, steep hills, and more. With full VR immersion, realistic vehicle physics, and dynamic terrain, this is the ultimate test of your driving skill and focus.

Choose from a variety of jeeps and offroad trucks, customize your ride, and explore open-world maps or push your limits in time-based racing challenges. Whether you're a casual driver or a hardcore offroad enthusiast, this game delivers adrenaline-pumping fun with every turn.

Key Features:
Realistic offroad driving physics in full VR
Multiple vehicles with customizable options
Free roam and mission-based gameplay
Dynamic environments: mud, hills, rocks, and rivers
Weather effects and day-night cycles
Intuitive VR controls for immersive driving
